title: Cisco security advisory (AV25-182)
description: On April 2, 2025, Cisco published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following:
products: Cisco Enterprise Chat and Email (ECE)  versions prior to 12.6 ES 10
Cisco Meraki MX and Cisco Meraki Z Series  firmware versions 16.2, 17, 18.1, 18.2 and 19.1
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
